segments.text: Hi Sam , would you like to come for a curry with us next Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I love curry . Who else is coming ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jane , Susan , Pete and two colleagues of mine from work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no plans for Friday , so curry would be great . Which restaurant do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Susan suggested the one on Main Street . She says it is very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , the one just on the corner with Oxford Street . There is a large pharmacy next door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , I know which one you mean . I have never been there , but I looked at their menu once and it did look good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay then . I think we will all meet outside ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At 8 o'clock . I will make the reservation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good . See you on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2
